name: Space Shooter: Alien War Invaders Free
name_original: Space Shooter: Alien War Invaders Free
description:
✭✭✭✭✭ THE YEAR IS 2069 - DEEP SPACE WAR IS ON ✭✭✭✭✭

Take control of the intergalactic PZ-3000 Spacecraft. You are the last remaining fighter in the war against the alien invaders. Can you save humanity?

So easy to control. Pilot your ship with one finger - fire your Photon Lasers with another. Hold down for rapid alien blasting action.

✭ WARNING: HIGHLY ADDICTIVE! ✭

• Gorgeous retina graphics
• Exciting endless gameplay
• Fast and frantic shooter

✭ UPGRADE YOUR SPACESHIPS ✭

Collect space credits to unlock better ships:

• PZ-4000 Spacecraft - Smaller and faster, fires three red lasers
• PZ-5000 Spacecraft - Slower, fires a devastating force field attack

Download NOW while it's 100% FREE.
